name: Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed
summary: Hyperdimension Neptunia U: Action Unleashed is a hack and slash video game and a spin-off title in the Hyperdimension Neptunia game series. The player can choose two characters to play with and switch between them during combat. The characters can transform and if they take too much damage, their clothing gets damaged.

alternative_names.name: 超次元アクション ネプテューヌU

esrb.synopsis: This is an action role-playing game in which players assume the role of young goddesses striving to gain publicity in a fantasy world. Players engage in various quests to battle fantastical enemies (e.g., ghosts, slime creatures, robots) in melee-style combat. Players use swords, spears, and laser guns to defeat enemies. Characters' clothing can occasionally rip apart during the course of battle. Camera angles sometimes focus on female characters' underwear, pelvic areas, and chests. The dialogue also includes suggestive material (e.g., “That doesn't mean we'll treat this like a panty-flashing picnic” and “Oh geez, can you imagine if Blanc was featured for her boobies.”). The words “b*tch” and “t*ts' appear in dialogue.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Non realistic looking violence towards human characters - Sexual images and/or sexual innuendo - Mild bad language
